name: PoolMetadata
description: PoolMetadata. this contract manages metadata definition for GYSR pools. It allows the pool controller to set metadata for that pool, which is then emitted as an event and indexed by the GYSR subgraph.

eventDecorators.name: Banned
eventDecorators.description: To call when there is consensus on final result.

eventDecorators.name: ControlTransferred
eventDecorators.description: To call when there is consensus on final result.

eventDecorators.name: FeeUpdated
eventDecorators.description: To call when there is consensus on final result.

eventDecorators.name: Metadata
eventDecorators.description: To call when there is consensus on final result.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: To call when there is consensus on final result.

eventDecorators.name: TreasuryUpdated
eventDecorators.description: To call when there is consensus on final result.

functionDecorators.name: ban
functionDecorators.description: privileged method to ban pool from submitting metadata. This does NOT affect the ability to manage the core Pool contract.

functionDecorators.name: clear
functionDecorators.description: privileged method to clear pool metadata.

functionDecorators.name: controller
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current controller.

functionDecorators.name: metadata
functionDecorators.description: define Pool metadata and emit associated event.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: setFee
functionDecorators.description: update the GYSR fee to submit Pool metadata.

functionDecorators.name: setTreasury
functionDecorators.description: update the treasury address to receive fees.

functionDecorators.name: transferControl
functionDecorators.description: Transfers control of the contract to a new account (`newController`). Can only be called by the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). This can include renouncing ownership by transferring to the zero address. Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: unban
functionDecorators.description: privileged method to unban pool and allow them to submit metadata.
